meanings.sent1: The biennials event was a great success.

meanings.definition: A plant that takes two years to complete its life cycle
meanings.sent1: The biennials in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Farmers planted biennials to ensure a colorful garden next year.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide nuts in the biennials.
meanings.sent4: The biennials stood tall, like nature's timekeepers.
meanings.sent5: The biennials added a touch of elegance to the landscape.
